modules.title: What Plugins Are and How They Work
modules.description: Cover the basics of Claude Code plugins; what they enable, core concepts, how they extend functionality, and examples of common use cases.

modules.title: Plugin Marketplaces and Discovery
modules.description: How to find plugins; navigate and manage marketplaces, evaluate plugin quality and security, and decide which plugins to install. Include a marketplace navigation walkthrough as demo.

modules.title: Lab: Adding the Demo Marketplace
modules.description: Add the demo marketplace and browse the plugins.

modules.title: Installing and Managing Plugins
modules.description: Cover the step-by-step installation process, managing installed plugins, troubleshooting common issues, and best practices for plugin management. Include a plugin installation walkthrough as demo.

modules.title: Lab: Adding a Demo Plugin
modules.description: Install a plugin from the demo marketplace.

modules.title: Creating Plugins
modules.description: Cover the plugin system, structure, organization patterns, testing plugins, debugging plugins, troubleshooting common issues, and best practices for plugin development. Include a plugin creation walkthrough as demo.

modules.title: Lab: Creating a Plugin with a Custom Skill
modules.description: Create the plugin directory, create the plugin manifest, add a skill, test the plugin, and add skill arguments.

modules.title: Converting Configurations to Plugins
modules.description: Cover the step-by-step migration process, troubleshooting common issues, and best practices for plugin conversions. Include a plugin conversion walkthrough as demo.

modules.title: Lab: Converting Hooks to Plugins
modules.description: Create the plugin structure, copy existing files, migrate hooks, and test the plugin.
